comments.stinfo_file: File that contains all information for input stars.
comments.stinfo_topdir: Directory name that holds all the stellar information
comments.stcolor_dir: Directory name that holds empirical relation information
comments.input_stars: filename of stars in single column ascii format.
comments.bv_colorfile: filename of empirical B and V colors & things.
comments.write2file: boolean that determines whether to write out results to file
comments.write_sed: boolean that determines whether to write out SED to file.
comments.longwave_Bool: boolean that determines whether to plot longer than 30um data
comments.W3Adapt: boolean that determines whether to use W3 to fit photopshere.
comments.W2Adapt: boolean that deteremines whether to use W2 to fit photosphere.
comments.wave_min: min wavelength in angstroms to calculate SED.
comments.wave_max: max wavelength in angstroms to calculate SED.
comments.mags2use0_original: Array of strings of all photometry used in session.
comments.mags4Phot0_original: Array of strings of photometry used in photospheric fit.
comments.mags4scale0_original: Array of strings of photometry used in scaling raw photosphere.
comments.mags4Dust0: Array of strings of photometry used to calculate blackbody
comments.scaleSEDbands: Array of strings of photometryused to scale final SED.
comments.Remove_RedStars: Array of strings of bands to remove for latest type stars.
comments.modifiedBB_lam0: Central wavelength band for modified blackbody calculation.
comments.fitphot: whether to fit the photosphere or not
comments.scalephot: Whether to re-scale the fitted stellar SED to a set of particular bands for whatever reason.
comments.changekeys: Whether to replace the WISE saturated corrected photometry keywords to standard WISE keywords.
